title: Tim McGraw lost 40 pounds after this comment
text:
(CNN) At 52, Tim McGraw is looking and feeling better than he ever has.

The country superstar has his daughter in part to thank for that.

In an interview with Men's Health McGraw said it was 11 years ago when his daughter Gracie saw him when in the film "Four Christmases" and remarked that her dad looked "big on the screen."

That struck a chord with the singer who had always been athletic in the past, but had gotten up to 215 pounds.

"I got out of it for a while," McGraw said. "I was in the prime of my career, and I wasn't capitalizing on it."
description: At 52, Tim McGraw is looking and feeling better than he ever has.
